# CNSpatialAudioRenderingStyle.studioForegroundStem

**Case**

Isolates all voices, add a studio/proximity effect in the voice track and place them in a mono stem. There is no ambience stem.

## Declaration

```swift
case studioForegroundStem
```
title: CNSpatialAudioRenderingStyle.studioForegroundStem
